title: simmonson
author: simmonson
content: We present the new Crypto Casino Online Gambling Casino Script with which you can create an online bitcoin and cryptocurrency betting site with the best Crash games, dice, slots, roulette, mines, duels, poker, war, plinko, blackjack, keno , limbo and many more in the style of Cryptocurrency Casinos.https://bitcoinsoftwares.online/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/crypto-casino-online-gambling-casino-script-1.pnghttps://bitcoinsoftwares.online/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/crypto-casino-online-gambling-casino-script-3-1536x1152.pngRight now there is a boom with online Bitcoin Casinos, why not design a Bitcoin Casino right now with this Script?⏩Features-Free Support 24.-Anti-VPN protection.-User Authentication.-Fake Players.-Fake Chat Players.-Perfect Game Security.-Hot Wallet System.-Auto Withdrawls system.-Deposit & Withdrawl System (Coinbase, FaucetPay).-Users Tip (send users bits to each other).-HighChart User Stats.-Live User Chat.-Transaction History.-Game Hash History.-Auto Script Playing.-Front and light Admin + Simple Wallet Manager.-Database Manager.-Standard Game Rules (eg the coefficients of the numbers).-Easy modification Server Side Scripts.-Easy Install (Free Install).-Bootstrap & WebSocket.-Responsive Design (mobie, tablet).-Bitcoin and Cryptocurrency Wallet Manager.-Admin Manager.⏩Games-Crash Game.-Keno.-Roulette.-Plinko.-Limbo.-Dice.-Miner.-Wheel.-Hilo.-Slots.⏩Requirements-OS: Linux or Windows (+SSH Access or terminal in windows).-HDD Space: You have 2 Options:-Using API Need 1 GB.-Using BTC Full Node Need 300 GB.-Node: v10x.-NPM: v6x.-Apache.-SSL.Link: https://bitcoinsoftwares.online/product/crypto-casino-online-gambling-casino-script/

comments.body: Quote from: simmonson on March 03, 2023, 02:07:16 PMUpdated to version 3.6 - 3/03/2023.No use posting here about the update of your product you have been tagged as a scammer and until now you haven't addressed the issue being thrown at you if you're serious about the products that you're selling here you will refute all the accusations against you and the products you are selling but you choose to ignore so I doubt you will get buyer here in Bitcointalk https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5431157.msg61489147#msg61489147

comments.author: simmonson
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on March 03, 2023, 03:17:32 PMQuote from: simmonson on March 03, 2023, 02:07:16 PMUpdated to version 3.6 - 3/03/2023.No use posting here about the update of your product you have been tagged as a scammer and until now you haven't addressed the issue being thrown at you if you're serious about the products that you're selling here you will refute all the accusations against you and the products you are selling but you choose to ignore so I doubt you will get buyer here in Bitcointalk https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5431157.msg61489147#msg61489147Hello, we ask that you refrain from republishing an unsubstantiated accusation and without evidence presented, if you have any problem about our business you can contact our resolutions department. On the other hand, we will not respond or attend to an emotional and fanciful accusation from any user.That being said, whether or not we capture sales is up to us, but thanks for your advice.
